text: Orak Island is an uninhabited Aegean island in Turkey. Its ancient name was Drepano.Geoname It is a part of Tavşan Islands. The island is at . Administratively it is in Ezine ilçe (district) of Çanakkale Province.Map page Its distance to the Anatolian coast is , to Bozcaada is and to Çanakkale is . ==References== Category:Islands of Çanakkale Province Category:Uninhabited islands of Turkey Category:Aegean islands Category:Ezine District Category:Islands of Turkey
title: Orak Island (Çanakkale)
